about_the_game:
Dracoslayer is a thrilling fighting game that combines intense PvE action with the strategic use of elemental abilities. Dive into an immersive combat experience where every skill and elemental property can shape the battle to your advantage.

Master the Elements:
Unleash a wide variety of unique skills and craft powerful strategies to outsmart your enemies and secure victory.

Seamless Controls:
Enjoy fluid, intuitive controls designed for effortless motion inputs, delivering a fast-paced and responsive combat experience.

Game Modes

Story Mode:
Embark on an epic adventure through the world of Dracoslayer. Face relentless waves of enemies, and battle formidable bosses.

Versus Mode:
Test your skills in 1v1 battles! Challenge a friend in local multiplayer or face off against AI opponents in adrenaline-pumping duels.

Unleash your inner warrior and dominate the battlefield in Dracoslayer!
